Draw a line (line\\_9) from (0.0, 0.1765) to (0.0, 0.0). The sketch forms a closed loop consisting of 9 curves as described above. Next, scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D with no rotation (Euler Angles: 0.0, 0.0, 0.0) and a translation vector of (0.0, 0.0, 0.0).
